characteristics.consequences_insufficient: Obesity, diabetes, cardiovascular disease, cognitive impairment
characteristics.sleep_hygiene_basics: Consistent schedule, dark/cool room, no screens 1hr before bed
characteristics.sleep_apnea: Screen with STOP-BANG, treat with CPAP

characteristics.aerobic_target: 150 min moderate OR 75 min vigorous weekly
